'''Twirly-Whirly''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Floating Anemo Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Floating Anemo Fungus V3

|name_1      = Tornado Slash
|desc_1      = Fires off a slashing wind bullet that deals '''600% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}} when it hits an opponent and pulls nearby opponents.

|name_2      = Corrosive Winds
|desc_2      = When a Swirl Reaction is triggered, decreases the target's corresponding Elemental [[RES]] by '''30%''' for '''6''' seconds.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Releases a honed wind projectile that deals '''250% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}}.
}}
